      • asyncSpeechToTextCall

        public com.squareup.okhttp.Call asyncSpeechToTextCall​(String language,
                                                      File files,
                                                      String providers,
                                                      String webhookReceiver,
                                                      String usersWebhookParameters,
                                                      String vocab,
                                                      ProgressResponseBody.ProgressListener progressListener,
                                                      ProgressRequestBody.ProgressRequestListener progressRequestListener)
                                               throws ApiException
        Build call for asyncSpeechToText
        Parameters:
        language - Language code expected (ex: fr-FR (French), en-US (English), es-ES (Spanish), nl-NL Dutch (Netherlands)) (required)
        files - File to analyse (ex: mp3, wav, m4a) (required)
        providers - Provider to compare (ex: [ 'amazon', 'microsoft', 'ibm','google', 'threescribe]) (required)
        webhookReceiver - Webhook reciever should be a valid https URL (ex : https://your.listner.com/endpoint) (optional)
        usersWebhookParameters - Json data that consist of additional parameters that will be sent back to the webhook receiver (ex: api key for security). **NOTE : The data will be returned back as a string that should be decoded into a json object!** (optional)
        vocab - Speechmatics allows to add a custom vocab dictionnary (json format) for better recognition, you can add it via this parameter. It has to be a list of dictionaries : {'content'(Required) : 'string', 'sounds_like'(Optional) : 'list of strings'} (optional)
        progressListener - Progress listener
        progressRequestListener - Progress request listener
        Returns:
        Call to execute
        Throws:
        ApiException - If fail to serialize the request body object

      • asyncSpeechToText

        public InlineResponse2001 asyncSpeechToText​(String language,
                                            File files,
                                            String providers,
                                            String webhookReceiver,
                                            String usersWebhookParameters,
                                            String vocab)
                                     throws ApiException
        Speech recognition is technology that can recognize spoken words, which can then be converted to text. This endpoint allows you to launch asynchronous speech recognition jobs. **SUPPORTED LANGUAGE** |Name|Type|Value| |----|----|-----| |**English (US)**|`string`|`en-US`| |**English (GB)**|`string`|`en-GB`| |**French**|`string`|`fr-FR`| |**Spanish**|`string`|`es-ES`| |**Dutch (Netherlands)**|`string`|`nl-NL`| |**Japanese**|`string`|`ja-JP`| |**Russian**|`string`|`ru-RU`| |**Arabic**|`string`|`ar-SA`| |**Italian**|`string`|`it-IT`| |**Korean**|`string`|`ko-KR`| |**Portuguese**|`string`|`pt-PT`| |**Turkish**|`string`|`tr-TR`| |**Indonesian**|`string`|`id-ID`| |**Malay**|`string`|`ms-MY`| **AVAILABLE PROVIDERS** |Name|Value|Version| |----|-----|-------| |**Amazon Web Services**|`amazon`| `boto3 (v1.15.18)` |**Speechmatics**|`speechmatics`| `2.7.0`
        Parameters:
        language - Language code expected (ex: fr-FR (French), en-US (English), es-ES (Spanish), nl-NL Dutch (Netherlands)) (required)
        files - File to analyse (ex: mp3, wav, m4a) (required)
        providers - Provider to compare (ex: [ 'amazon', 'microsoft', 'ibm','google', 'threescribe]) (required)
        webhookReceiver - Webhook reciever should be a valid https URL (ex : https://your.listner.com/endpoint) (optional)
        usersWebhookParameters - Json data that consist of additional parameters that will be sent back to the webhook receiver (ex: api key for security). **NOTE : The data will be returned back as a string that should be decoded into a json object!** (optional)
        vocab - Speechmatics allows to add a custom vocab dictionnary (json format) for better recognition, you can add it via this parameter. It has to be a list of dictionaries : {'content'(Required) : 'string', 'sounds_like'(Optional) : 'list of strings'} (optional)
        Returns:
        InlineResponse2001
        Throws:
        ApiException - If fail to call the API, e.g. server error or cannot deserialize the response body

      • asyncSpeechToTextWithHttpInfo

        public ApiResponse<InlineResponse2001> asyncSpeechToTextWithHttpInfo​(String language,
                                                                     File files,
                                                                     String providers,
                                                                     String webhookReceiver,
                                                                     String usersWebhookParameters,
                                                                     String vocab)
                                                              throws ApiException
        Speech recognition is technology that can recognize spoken words, which can then be converted to text. This endpoint allows you to launch asynchronous speech recognition jobs. **SUPPORTED LANGUAGE** |Name|Type|Value| |----|----|-----| |**English (US)**|`string`|`en-US`| |**English (GB)**|`string`|`en-GB`| |**French**|`string`|`fr-FR`| |**Spanish**|`string`|`es-ES`| |**Dutch (Netherlands)**|`string`|`nl-NL`| |**Japanese**|`string`|`ja-JP`| |**Russian**|`string`|`ru-RU`| |**Arabic**|`string`|`ar-SA`| |**Italian**|`string`|`it-IT`| |**Korean**|`string`|`ko-KR`| |**Portuguese**|`string`|`pt-PT`| |**Turkish**|`string`|`tr-TR`| |**Indonesian**|`string`|`id-ID`| |**Malay**|`string`|`ms-MY`| **AVAILABLE PROVIDERS** |Name|Value|Version| |----|-----|-------| |**Amazon Web Services**|`amazon`| `boto3 (v1.15.18)` |**Speechmatics**|`speechmatics`| `2.7.0`
        Parameters:
        language - Language code expected (ex: fr-FR (French), en-US (English), es-ES (Spanish), nl-NL Dutch (Netherlands)) (required)
        files - File to analyse (ex: mp3, wav, m4a) (required)
        providers - Provider to compare (ex: [ 'amazon', 'microsoft', 'ibm','google', 'threescribe]) (required)
        webhookReceiver - Webhook reciever should be a valid https URL (ex : https://your.listner.com/endpoint) (optional)
        usersWebhookParameters - Json data that consist of additional parameters that will be sent back to the webhook receiver (ex: api key for security). **NOTE : The data will be returned back as a string that should be decoded into a json object!** (optional)
        vocab - Speechmatics allows to add a custom vocab dictionnary (json format) for better recognition, you can add it via this parameter. It has to be a list of dictionaries : {'content'(Required) : 'string', 'sounds_like'(Optional) : 'list of strings'} (optional)
        Returns:
        ApiResponse<InlineResponse2001>
        Throws:
        ApiException - If fail to call the API, e.g. server error or cannot deserialize the response body

      • asyncSpeechToTextAsync

        public com.squareup.okhttp.Call asyncSpeechToTextAsync​(String language,
                                                       File files,
                                                       String providers,
                                                       String webhookReceiver,
                                                       String usersWebhookParameters,
                                                       String vocab,
                                                       ApiCallback<InlineResponse2001> callback)
                                                throws ApiException
        (asynchronously) Speech recognition is technology that can recognize spoken words, which can then be converted to text. This endpoint allows you to launch asynchronous speech recognition jobs. **SUPPORTED LANGUAGE** |Name|Type|Value| |----|----|-----| |**English (US)**|`string`|`en-US`| |**English (GB)**|`string`|`en-GB`| |**French**|`string`|`fr-FR`| |**Spanish**|`string`|`es-ES`| |**Dutch (Netherlands)**|`string`|`nl-NL`| |**Japanese**|`string`|`ja-JP`| |**Russian**|`string`|`ru-RU`| |**Arabic**|`string`|`ar-SA`| |**Italian**|`string`|`it-IT`| |**Korean**|`string`|`ko-KR`| |**Portuguese**|`string`|`pt-PT`| |**Turkish**|`string`|`tr-TR`| |**Indonesian**|`string`|`id-ID`| |**Malay**|`string`|`ms-MY`| **AVAILABLE PROVIDERS** |Name|Value|Version| |----|-----|-------| |**Amazon Web Services**|`amazon`| `boto3 (v1.15.18)` |**Speechmatics**|`speechmatics`| `2.7.0`
        Parameters:
        language - Language code expected (ex: fr-FR (French), en-US (English), es-ES (Spanish), nl-NL Dutch (Netherlands)) (required)
        files - File to analyse (ex: mp3, wav, m4a) (required)
        providers - Provider to compare (ex: [ 'amazon', 'microsoft', 'ibm','google', 'threescribe]) (required)
        webhookReceiver - Webhook reciever should be a valid https URL (ex : https://your.listner.com/endpoint) (optional)
        usersWebhookParameters - Json data that consist of additional parameters that will be sent back to the webhook receiver (ex: api key for security). **NOTE : The data will be returned back as a string that should be decoded into a json object!** (optional)
        vocab - Speechmatics allows to add a custom vocab dictionnary (json format) for better recognition, you can add it via this parameter. It has to be a list of dictionaries : {'content'(Required) : 'string', 'sounds_like'(Optional) : 'list of strings'} (optional)
        callback - The callback to be executed when the API call finishes
        Returns:
        The request call
        Throws:
        ApiException - If fail to process the API call, e.g. serializing the request body object

      • speechToTextCall

        public com.squareup.okhttp.Call speechToTextCall​(String language,
                                                 File files,
                                                 String providers,
                                                 String vocab,
                                                 ProgressResponseBody.ProgressListener progressListener,
                                                 ProgressRequestBody.ProgressRequestListener progressRequestListener)
                                          throws ApiException
        Build call for speechToText
        Parameters:
        language - Language code expected (ex: fr-FR (French), en-US (English), es-ES (Spanish), nl-NL Dutch (Netherlands)) (required)
        files - File to analyse (ex: mp3, wav, m4a) (required)
        providers - Provider to compare (ex: [ 'amazon', 'microsoft', 'ibm','google', 'threescribe]) (required)
        vocab - Speechmatics allows to add a custom vocab dictionnary (json format) for better recognition, you can add it via this parameter. It has to be a list of dictionaries : {'content'(Required) : 'string', 'sounds_like'(Optional) : 'list of strings'} (optional)
        progressListener - Progress listener
        progressRequestListener - Progress request listener
        Returns:
        Call to execute
        Throws:
        ApiException - If fail to serialize the request body object

      • speechToText

        public InlineResponse201 speechToText​(String language,
                                      File files,
                                      String providers,
                                      String vocab)
                               throws ApiException
        Speech recognition is technology that can recognize spoken words, which can then be converted to text. **SUPPORTED LANGUAGE** |Name|Type|Value| |----|----|-----| |**English (US)**|`string`|`en-US`| |**English (GB)**|`string`|`en-GB`| |**French**|`string`|`fr-FR`| |**Spanish**|`string`|`es-ES`| |**Dutch (Netherlands)**|`string`|`nl-NL`| |**Japanese**|`string`|`ja-JP`| |**Russian**|`string`|`ru-RU`| |**Arabic**|`string`|`ar-SA`| |**Italian**|`string`|`it-IT`| |**Korean**|`string`|`ko-KR`| |**Portuguese**|`string`|`pt-PT`| |**Turkish**|`string`|`tr-TR`| |**Indonesian**|`string`|`id-ID`| |**Malay**|`string`|`ms-MY`| **AVAILABLE PROVIDERS** |Name|Value|Version| |----|-----|-------| |**Microsoft Azure**|`microsoft`| `v1.0` |**Amazon Web Services**|`amazon`| `boto3 (v1.15.18)` |**Google Cloud**|`google`| `v1p1beta1` |**Deepgram**|`deepgram`| `v1` |**RevAi**|`revai`| `v1`
        Parameters:
        language - Language code expected (ex: fr-FR (French), en-US (English), es-ES (Spanish), nl-NL Dutch (Netherlands)) (required)
        files - File to analyse (ex: mp3, wav, m4a) (required)
        providers - Provider to compare (ex: [ 'amazon', 'microsoft', 'ibm','google', 'threescribe]) (required)
        vocab - Speechmatics allows to add a custom vocab dictionnary (json format) for better recognition, you can add it via this parameter. It has to be a list of dictionaries : {'content'(Required) : 'string', 'sounds_like'(Optional) : 'list of strings'} (optional)
        Returns:
        InlineResponse201
        Throws:
        ApiException - If fail to call the API, e.g. server error or cannot deserialize the response body

        public com.squareup.okhttp.Call speechToTextAsync​(String language,
                                                  File files,
                                                  String providers,

                                           throws ApiException
        (asynchronously) Speech recognition is technology that can recognize spoken words, which can then be converted to text. **SUPPORTED LANGUAGE** |Name|Type|Value| |----|----|-----| |**English (US)**|`string`|`en-US`| |**English (GB)**|`string`|`en-GB`| |**French**|`string`|`fr-FR`| |**Spanish**|`string`|`es-ES`| |**Dutch (Netherlands)**|`string`|`nl-NL`| |**Japanese**|`string`|`ja-JP`| |**Russian**|`string`|`ru-RU`| |**Arabic**|`string`|`ar-SA`| |**Italian**|`string`|`it-IT`| |**Korean**|`string`|`ko-KR`| |**Portuguese**|`string`|`pt-PT`| |**Turkish**|`string`|`tr-TR`| |**Indonesian**|`string`|`id-ID`| |**Malay**|`string`|`ms-MY`| **AVAILABLE PROVIDERS** |Name|Value|Version| |----|-----|-------| |**Microsoft Azure**|`microsoft`| `v1.0` |**Amazon Web Services**|`amazon`| `boto3 (v1.15.18)` |**Google Cloud**|`google`| `v1p1beta1` |**Deepgram**|`deepgram`| `v1` |**RevAi**|`revai`| `v1`

      • textToSpeechCall

        public com.squareup.okhttp.Call textToSpeechCall​(String text,
                                                 String language,
                                                 String option,
                                                 String providers,
                                                 ProgressResponseBody.ProgressListener progressListener,
                                                 ProgressRequestBody.ProgressRequestListener progressRequestListener)
                                          throws ApiException
        Build call for textToSpeech
        Parameters:
        text - Text to transform (required)
        language - Language code expected (ex: fr-FR (French), en-US (English), es-ES (Spanish)) (required)
        option - Voice gender selected (ex: FEMALE ou MALE) (required)
        providers - Provider to compare (ex: [ 'amazon', 'microsoft', 'ibm','google']) (required)
        progressListener - Progress listener
        progressRequestListener - Progress request listener
        Returns:
        Call to execute
        Throws:
        ApiException - If fail to serialize the request body object

      • textToSpeech

        public InlineResponse2011 textToSpeech​(String text,
                                       String language,
                                       String option,
                                       String providers)
                                throws ApiException
        Text-to-speech (TTS) system converts normal language text into speech. **SUPPORTED LANGUAGE** |Name|Type|Value| |----|----|-----| |**Arabic**|`string`|`ar-XA`| |**Chinese**|`string`|`cmn-CN`| |**Danish**|`string`|`da-DK`| |**Dutch**|`string`|`nl-NL`| |**English (US)**|`string`|`en-US`| |**English (UK)**|`string`|`en-GB`| |**German**|`string`|`de-DE`| |**Italy**|`string`|`it-IT`| |**Japanese**|`string`|`ja-JP`| |**Portuguese (Brazil)**|`string`|`pt-BR`| |**Portuguese (Portugal)**|`string`|`pt-PT`| |**Russian**|`string`|`ru-RU`| |**Spanish**|`string`|`es-ES`| **AVAILABLE PROVIDERS** |Name|Value|Version| |----|-----|-------| |**Microsoft Azure**|`microsoft`| `v1.0` |**Amazon Web Services**|`amazon`| `boto3 (v1.15.18)` |**Google Cloud**|`google`| `v1`
        Parameters:
        text - Text to transform (required)
        language - Language code expected (ex: fr-FR (French), en-US (English), es-ES (Spanish)) (required)
        option - Voice gender selected (ex: FEMALE ou MALE) (required)
        providers - Provider to compare (ex: [ 'amazon', 'microsoft', 'ibm','google']) (required)
        Returns:
        InlineResponse2011
        Throws:
        ApiException - If fail to call the API, e.g. server error or cannot deserialize the response body

      • textToSpeechWithHttpInfo

        public ApiResponse<InlineResponse2011> textToSpeechWithHttpInfo​(String text,
                                                                String language,
                                                                String option,
                                                                String providers)
                                                         throws ApiException
        Text-to-speech (TTS) system converts normal language text into speech. **SUPPORTED LANGUAGE** |Name|Type|Value| |----|----|-----| |**Arabic**|`string`|`ar-XA`| |**Chinese**|`string`|`cmn-CN`| |**Danish**|`string`|`da-DK`| |**Dutch**|`string`|`nl-NL`| |**English (US)**|`string`|`en-US`| |**English (UK)**|`string`|`en-GB`| |**German**|`string`|`de-DE`| |**Italy**|`string`|`it-IT`| |**Japanese**|`string`|`ja-JP`| |**Portuguese (Brazil)**|`string`|`pt-BR`| |**Portuguese (Portugal)**|`string`|`pt-PT`| |**Russian**|`string`|`ru-RU`| |**Spanish**|`string`|`es-ES`| **AVAILABLE PROVIDERS** |Name|Value|Version| |----|-----|-------| |**Microsoft Azure**|`microsoft`| `v1.0` |**Amazon Web Services**|`amazon`| `boto3 (v1.15.18)` |**Google Cloud**|`google`| `v1`
        Parameters:
        text - Text to transform (required)
        language - Language code expected (ex: fr-FR (French), en-US (English), es-ES (Spanish)) (required)
        option - Voice gender selected (ex: FEMALE ou MALE) (required)
        providers - Provider to compare (ex: [ 'amazon', 'microsoft', 'ibm','google']) (required)
        Returns:
        ApiResponse<InlineResponse2011>
        Throws:
        ApiException - If fail to call the API, e.g. server error or cannot deserialize the response body

      • textToSpeechAsync

        public com.squareup.okhttp.Call textToSpeechAsync​(String text,
                                                  String language,
                                                  String option,
                                                  String providers,
                                                  ApiCallback<InlineResponse2011> callback)
                                           throws ApiException
        (asynchronously) Text-to-speech (TTS) system converts normal language text into speech. **SUPPORTED LANGUAGE** |Name|Type|Value| |----|----|-----| |**Arabic**|`string`|`ar-XA`| |**Chinese**|`string`|`cmn-CN`| |**Danish**|`string`|`da-DK`| |**Dutch**|`string`|`nl-NL`| |**English (US)**|`string`|`en-US`| |**English (UK)**|`string`|`en-GB`| |**German**|`string`|`de-DE`| |**Italy**|`string`|`it-IT`| |**Japanese**|`string`|`ja-JP`| |**Portuguese (Brazil)**|`string`|`pt-BR`| |**Portuguese (Portugal)**|`string`|`pt-PT`| |**Russian**|`string`|`ru-RU`| |**Spanish**|`string`|`es-ES`| **AVAILABLE PROVIDERS** |Name|Value|Version| |----|-----|-------| |**Microsoft Azure**|`microsoft`| `v1.0` |**Amazon Web Services**|`amazon`| `boto3 (v1.15.18)` |**Google Cloud**|`google`| `v1`
        Parameters:
        text - Text to transform (required)
        language - Language code expected (ex: fr-FR (French), en-US (English), es-ES (Spanish)) (required)
        option - Voice gender selected (ex: FEMALE ou MALE) (required)
        providers - Provider to compare (ex: [ 'amazon', 'microsoft', 'ibm','google']) (required)
        callback - The callback to be executed when the API call finishes
        Returns:
        The request call
        Throws:
        ApiException - If fail to process the API call, e.g. serializing the request body object
